source.name: GPT-3 code writting
source.instructions: Which of the following tasks related to coding can readily be performed by GPT-3?

answers.answer: Identifying the root cause of a server error
Generating complex algorithms for data analysis
Automatically translating written code into different programming languages
Predicting future trends in software development

source.guidance:
The correct answer would be "Automatically translating written code into different programming languages
", as GPT-3 can generate code in different programming languages. This question tests the learners's understanding of the information you provided about GPT-3's capabilities related to coding, and requires them to differentiate between different tasks that may or may not be within the realm of what GPT-3 can easily do.
